mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS rownum, b.*, IFNULL (l.cnt, 0) AS likehit FROM bbs b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT b_idx, SUM(status) AS cnt FROM iamcamper.like GROUP BY b_idx) l ON l.b_idx = b.b_idx WHERE b.status = 0 AND b.bname = #{bname}) a, (SELECT @RN:=0) r WHERE rownum BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO iamcamper.like(m_idx, b_idx, status) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{b_idx}, 1)
INSERT INTO iamcamper.like(m_idx, c_idx, status) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{c_idx}, 1)
